text: There have been several ships in the Royal Norwegian Navy named after the Norwegian explorer and Nobel peace prize winner Fridtjof Nansen. * – patrol vessel from 1931. * – a new class of Aegis frigates from 2005. ** lead ship of the class. ==See also== * , a cruise ship Category:Royal Norwegian Navy ship names Category:Fridtjof Nansen
title: HNoMS Fridtjof Nansen
